spec_data.Name: perl-Template-Plugin-Cycle
spec_data.Description:
Sometimes, apparently almost exclusively when doing alternating table row
backgrounds, you need to print an alternating, cycling, set of values into
a template.

Template::Plugin::Cycle is a small, simple, and hopefully DWIM solution to
these sorts of tasks.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:22:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Cyclically insert into a Template from a sequence of values
